ing: 1 chipotle chile in adobo sauce, seeded
1 (1 inch) piece dried ancho chile pepper
1 tablespoon lemon juice, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste
des: "A wonderful salsa that uses chipotle and ancho. It adds depth to the overall flavor without overpowering the salsa, making it the perfect snacking salsa as well as a great addition to mexican dishes."
ins: Place the tomatoes, jalapeno pepper, chipotle pepper, ancho chile, garlic, onion, cilantro, lemon juice, salt, sugar, and cumin into a blender. Pulse until the salsa has been finely ground, or to your desired consistency. Let stand at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to blend.
